title: Meditation on the Move Invigorated Living Launches Portable Zen Pillow
text:
(MENAFN Press) Meditation on the Move: Invigorated Living Launches Portable Zen Pillow Lifestyle company Invigorated Living has launched an innovative inflatable meditation cushion named Travel Zen so people can practice anywhere anytime. 
PDF to JPEG Converter PDF to JPEG Converter TimeZone Converter Online PR News – 23-September-2015 – Australian premium lifestyle-products designer Invigorated Living has released its new Travel ZEN inflatable meditation pillow which now makes it possible for meditation and yoga enthusiasts to practice relaxation in practically any location at any time. Portable and sturdy Invigorated Living co-founder Dan Carlin said his company's newest release is a must-have for consistent meditation amid busy schedules.
"Meditation is our key to balancing our busy life. But we travel a lot which was making it hard to keep up regular meditation practice because we couldn't take our traditional meditation chair or meditation bench with us" Carlin said. "We decided to develop Travel ZEN because we understood that consistent meditation practice is needed to unlock the amazing benefits of meditation and we absolutely love it!"
As every meditation enthusiast knows taking a few quiet moments each day is a necessary component to a well-balanced life. Travel can make that daily practice difficult to achieve because of shifting time zones constantly changing accommodations and long hours on plane flights.
Invigorated Living's Travel ZEN inflatable meditation cushion offers consumers the anywhere anytime approach to meditation. Pinch the pillow's valve and use a pump or your mouth to inflate the pillow to the suitable firmness. Within just one or two minutes you'll be able to transform your hectic schedule into a relaxing one as your coworkers and colleagues rush through their busy days.
Once you're done with your meditation session open the easy-to-access air valve release the air in the pillow and then roll it up and place it back in its travel pouch it's the most portable peace you can find.
"Travel ZEN is inflatable which means its super lightweight plus can be deflated easily and packed into its carry pouch" Carlin said. "People can now meditate anywhere anytime.
In addition to being your foundation for relaxation and meditation during work trips and vacations Travel ZEN can double as a comfortable travel pillow or a knee rest for gardening. The pillow's design helps strengthen core muscles and provides support for the knees hips spine and neck.
Carlin pointed out that the Travel ZEN meditation cushion not only saves space that you'd normally take up with a traditional meditation pillow or chair but it's also made from high-quality durable materials that can support up to 220 pounds.
Invigorated Living's Travel ZEN portable meditation pillow is now available for purchase on Amazon.com and on InvigoratedLiving.com.
